query:
SELECT 
  a.id as ad_account_id,
  a.storeName,
  a.marketplace,
  dp.accountId as performance_accountId,
  dp.records,
  dp.totalSpend
FROM ad_accounts a
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT accountId, COUNT(*) as records, SUM(spend) as totalSpend
  FROM daily_performance 
  GROUP BY accountId
) dp ON a.id = dp.accountId;
